attributes.action: STOP THE 8 PENCE INCREASE IN FUEL DUTY ON PETROL
attributes.additional_details:
A 4pence a litre rise in fuel duty in january 2012, and another 4 pence a litre in August 2012 is to be implemented by the goverment!

Enough is enough!  The  government should freeze fuel duty for the forseeable future.

This rise hits all, hits industry and risks pushing the UK into recession.
